With Movyx, you can easily pay your IPVA and fines, with the option to split payments into up to 12 installments on your credit card. The app also allows you to monitor all your vehicle notifications from DETRAN in one convenient place. You can check the current market value of your vehicle using the FIPE Table and access digital rotating parking services in Belo Horizonte. Additionally, Movyx offers a promotional campaign where you get a free digital rotating parking ticket after purchasing ten.
